trends: There have been 116 other sightings in Dallas
There were no other sightings in Dallas on or around February 7th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking out of the Cinemark 17 movie theater Webb Chapel and Forest andfirst noticed three lights flowing overhead at high altitude. I thought it wasa jet and ignored it. When I got into my firends car, we began to pull out ofthe parking lot, I looked up and saw what appeared to be the same three lightsover the same path it had originally been over - but it was at a lower altitudeand flying in the opposite direction. As it came past our car I got a closerlook at the object. It appeared triangular and was a bit offset. Then, as itpassed by, it appeared to turn on its side and fly between two nearby buildings. As the car turned on Forest I tried to see if the object had come out on theother side - there was no sign of it.
